chapters.title: Chapter 1: An Empty Road
chapters.info: Haral Luhhan is the Blacksmith of Emond's Field. His arms are as big as most men's legs, and his chest strains his shirt. He is the tallest man in the Two Rivers. Perrin Aybara is his apprentice. His wife, Alsbet, is almost as large as he is. He sits on the Village Council. See also Aybara, Perrin; Luhhan, Alsbet.
